item.title: REQ! nees stay 10 sec before log out
item.dc:creator: @ip0wns ip0wns
item.description:
@ip0wns wrote:

[quote=“xEnt, post:9, topic:221186”][code]package com.rscd.packethandler;

import com.rscd.net.Packet;
import com.rscd.model.Player;
import com.rscd.model.MobState;
import com.rscd.packetbuilder.StaticPacketBuilder;
import org.apache.mina.common.IoSession;

public class PlayerLogoutRequest implements PacketHandler
{
public void handlePacket(Packet p, IoSession session)
{
Player player = (Player) session.getAttachment();
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - player.getCombatTimer() > 10000 && player.getState() != MobState.SEIZED)
{
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - player.getLastMoved() < 10000) {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You have to stand still for 10 seconds before you can log out”);
return;
}
player.getActionSender().sendLogout();
} else
{
player.getActionSender().sendCantLogout();
}

}

}[/code][/quote]
thx xEnt.
but when i log out then loging out stay 10 sec before loging out removed and then can log out

Read full topic

[code]package com.rscd.packethandler;

import com.rscd.net.Packet;
import com.rscd.model.Player;

import com.rscd.packetbuilder.StaticPacketBuilder;
import org.apache.mina.common.IoSession;

public class PlayerLogoutRequest implements PacketHandler
{
public void handlePacket(Packet p, IoSession session)
{
Player player = (Player) session.getAttachment();
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - player.getCombatTimer() > 10000 && player.getState() != MobState.SEIZED)
{
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - player.getLastMoved() < 10000) {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You have to stand still for 10 seconds before you can log out”);
return;
}
player.getActionSender().sendLogout();
} else
{
player.getActionSender().sendCantLogout();
}

}

}[/code]

item.title: REQ! nees stay 10 sec before log out
item.dc:creator: @ip0wns ip0wns
item.description:
@ip0wns wrote:

dumm1s its not work :S

[code]package com.rscd.packethandler;

import com.rscd.net.Packet;
import com.rscd.model.Player;
import com.rscd.model.MobState;
import com.rscd.packetbuilder.StaticPacketBuilder;
import org.apache.mina.common.IoSession;

public class PlayerLogoutRequest implements PacketHandler
{
public void handlePacket(Packet p, IoSession session)
{
Player player = (Player) session.getAttachment();
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - player.getCombatTimer() > 10000 && player.getState() != MobState.SEIZED)
{
player.getActionSender().sendLogout();
} else
{
player.getActionSender().sendCantLogout();
}
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - player.getLastMoved() < 10000) {
player.getActionSender().sendMessage(“You have to stand still for 10 seconds before you can log out”);
}
}
}
[/code]

[code]package com.rscd.packethandler;

import com.rscd.model.Player;

public class PlayerLogoutRequest implements PacketHandler
{
public void handlePacket(Packet p, IoSession session)
{
Player player = (Player) session.getAttachment();
if(System.currentTimeMillis() - player.getCombatTimer() > 10000 && player.getState() != MobState.SEIZED)
{
player.getActionSender().sendLogout();
